title: This Thread is open to Teemo Mains only until 2:30pm
body:
{{champion:17}} 

I just want to drop some fire about the systemic oppression I face as a Teemo player. So many people will call you 'satan' or say something else similarly bigoted, and Riot just goes along with it (Look at the "Devil Teemo" skin... problematic much?).  People don't care that you're good at Teemo and will even insult you for playing enough Teemo to reach Mastery 7. Until you're 10/0 picking up Quadra kills nobody wants to acknowledge you or your struggles. But if Ahri is 2/2 and gets a double kill with a gank everyone is like "GJ". SMH Midbabies.

replies.body: I am very offended as a Teemo main that I am often refered to as satan.
they won't be bitching after you shove a shroom up their rear. oh wait, maybe that's why they are being negative. {{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}
i main nothing, can i come in? c:
Are nami main welcome? you would love ardent buff teemo mains dont you?
We'll make exceptions on a case by case basis, maybe
